_source.text: According to the latest state Department of Health data, St. Clair's overall hospital-acquired infection rate of 2.10 cases per 1,000 patient hospital days is better than the state average of 2.22.

text: According to the latest state **Department** **of** **Health** data, St. Clair's overall hospital-acquired
infection rate of 2.10 cases per 1,000 patient hospital days **is** **better** **than** the state average of 2.22.

_source.text: A Department of Health spokesman said that "over time", all children between two and 16 will be offered the nasal spray vaccination, which is painless and works better than the injection, with fewer side effects.

text: A **Department** **of** **Health** spokesman said that "over time", all children between two and 16 will be
offered the nasal spray vaccination, which is painless and works **better** **than** the injection, with fewer side effects.

_source.text: After its most successful year to date, F&E is already working with the UAE Ministry of Education to ensure GESS and GEF 2012 is bigger and better than ever.

text: After its most successful year to date, F&E is already working with the UAE **Ministry** **of** **Education** to ensure GESS and GEF 2012 is bigger and **better** **than** ever.
